channel.title: Just an idea
channel.description:
Well, Ive been going to this website since like '06. Made an account but forgot everything about it, so i made a new one. One thing i noticed is that most replies go something like this "Leach! dude get a life" or "its horrible, you suck" or some other form of disrespectful nonsense that really does not help the thread contrary to popular belief. Now I understand if someone actually does leach something and can be proven to state that. But these arguements are extremely childish and make quite a few people not even want to come to this site. If you are going to say something let it be constructive criticism or a compliment, not some stupid quirky insult that actually makes you look pretty dumb. I come here to see the latest news on RSPS, not to hear someone complain and cry about someone elses post.... ;D Im probably going to hear some lame cry about this one, lol "Welcome to moparscape, this is how it works here" or some other retarded comment.
Moparian Rep: 200 Offline Re: [delta] starting coding [delta] « Reply #10 on: August 05, 2011, 09:12:11 PM » Quote -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- My opinion about this is that people who are not even smart enough to understand how to make a simple command after probbaly seeing 1000's of them released on moparscape formus, and still don't understand how to write a command should stop programming.
My point right here...

item.title: Just an idea
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:2, topic:429721”]When you’ve seen the same sever posted 2000+ times with a slightly altered home and a “new combat system” you will start to think like the rest. Hell, I don’t even go in the download section anymore.[/quote]We have a downloads sections (joke)

Read full topic

item.title: Just an idea
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I support people flaming to be honest. If REAL work has been done then it may be okay. But almost 90% of the time it’s just a copy/paste tutorial

Read full topic

item.title: Just an idea
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Even though the insults do seem out of hand at times, it’s not our fault that people don’t learn at our speed, nor put the effort out to actually learn something about how the server works before posting stupid things. I learned about commands by looking though commands and tinkering with them for a week or so. Then I loved on to something else. It’s not that hard to explore what you are doing before immediately asking for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Just an idea
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Acorn_:

[quote author=sickboys2011 link=topic=532400.msg3891332#msg3891332 date=1326879170]you suck

On a more serious note, most of the members who tend to hang around in the general discussion section don’t even code anymore let alone play Runescape.[/quote]
Precisely.

I enjoy the General Discussion parts of this community more than the RSPS/Runescape sections.

Read full topic
